title: ‘She was the last person to deserve this’: Father recalls final moments with 12-year-old LGBTQ supporter daughter killed by trans in Canada shooting
summary_full: A transgender individual fatally shot eight people, including a 12-year-old LGBTQ supporter, in Tumbler Ridge, Canadian Rockies. The father recounted the tragic morning his children went to school, unaware it would be their last time together. His son survived by hiding, while his daughter was among the victims.
